channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 在摩根大通首席执行官称赞唐纳德-特朗普在担任总统期间对美国经济和外交政策的处理方式两个多月后，他举行了这次私人会晤。那么，这顿午餐到底是为了什么呢？
item.description:
The private meeting came a little more than two months after the JPMorgan Chase chief executive praised Donald Trump for his handling of the US economy and foreign policy while president. So what was this lunch all about? https://t.co/Rru49PxwzA pic.twitter.com/ncJSQfeGQj

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）同意在一项具有里程碑意义的和解协议中削减其在美国的交易费用，这将在五年内为它们节省 300 亿美元。
item.description:
Breaking news: Visa and Mastercard have agreed to cut their US transaction fees in a landmark settlement that will save them $30bn over five years https://t.co/bTCb8gjoJt pic.twitter.com/XRJVKjcrdE

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024

item.title: 威士卡和万事达卡就美国交易费问题达成 300 亿美元和解协议
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) March 26, 2024
